title: Lumina Spacious 1 BR/1BA w/Views - high floor
posting_body: ['Great location in sunny SOMA/East Cut neighborhood within easy walking distance to the Ferry Building, Embarcadero, Bay Bridge and many great restaurants.', 'Modern condo unit features one bedroom, one bath one a high floor with great views looking toward Twin Peaks/Sutro Tower.', 'With approximately 855 square feet of space, this is ideal for a single person or a couple.', 'Unit available: early-August.', 'Unit features include:', 'Gaggenau kitchen appliances', 'Elegant hardwood floors throughout', 'Nest thermostat to control in-unit AC/heater', 'Walk-in bedroom closet features build-in shelves/organizers', 'Custom solar shades in windows', 'Bosch washer/dryer', 'On-site community amenities:', '24-hour on-site concierge/doorman', 'Fitness center (approx.', '7,000 square feet)', 'Club lounge', 'Game room', 'Library lounge', 'Pool (saline) and spa', 'Private dining room', 'Rooftop terrace with BBQ’s and tables/chairs', 'Screening room', 'Woodlands Market on ground level', 'Lease terms:', 'One year', 'Security deposit = one month rent', 'Owner pays trash/water', 'On-site valet parking available (for a fee)', 'Tenant pays Lumina HOA move-in/move out fee', 'Credit score 700+', 'NO smoking', 'NO pets', 'NO short-term rental']
